political_crisis_start.title: Emergency Assembly Session
political_crisis_start.description: The Root Assembly chamber buzzes with panic. Acting Speaker Thorn addresses a half-empty room: 'Delegates Willow, Sage, and Ember disappeared three days ago during closed negotiations about trade route rights. Without them, we cannot ratify the Seasonal Compact. The legal framework holding our communities together hangs by a thread.'

choices.text: 'What were they negotiating that was so sensitive?'
'Can the Compact be ratified without them?'
